About the weblog editor, here's the deal: It's being overhauled, top-to-bottom, for the next release of NetNewsWire. It will be quite different from the current weblog editor. The goals are: 1. To make it easier to use *and* more powerful. The user interface has been completely re-designed. 2. To support more weblog features than are currently supported. (Things like Movable Type keywords.) 3. To make it a better text/HTML editor. 4. To fix a bunch of bugs. 5. To make it scriptable.
